title: C46 Gandil Imperial Tobacco Black Sox PSA 3
author: ricktmd

posts.post_title: C46 Gandil Imperial Tobacco Black Sox PSA 3
posts.post_content:
Offered here is a very nice example of a C46 Chick Gandil Imperial Tobacco Card from 1912 when Gandil was playing in the minor leagues for Montreal. This card looks fantastic with a small crease you can see in the bottom corner of the card. Gandil was one of the organizers of the 1919 White Sox when they threw the World Series. Thanks for lookin
Sold.... usps flat rate box
